name: Foelsen, Nils
resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Experienced chemical and pharmaceutical technician with a strong background in GMP-compliant process engineering, qualification, and validation within pharmaceutical and laboratory environments. Skilled in system administration (DMS, MES, ERP), process documentation, and working with utilities and cleanroom systems.
